name: RumShot GumDrop
description:
DIVE DEEP INTO A RABBIT HOLE OF HALLUCINATIONS CONSTANTLY ASSAULTED BY A LEVEL THAT EVOLVES FROM THE CHOICES YOU MAKE AND THE COMPETENCY AT WHICH YOU PERFORM.

BECOME THE MOST POWERFUL GUM SHOOTER EVER AND YET, CONFRONT WITH THE HARDEST FIGHT IN YOUR LIFE!

A dynamic content design project by me and my classmate, Koh Jin Peng. The version that is submitted at the end of the project is named GumDrop_SubmittedVer_OS. Future updated versions will be named GumDrop_V##_OS, if any.

Controls:

Arrow keys or A/D to move left/right

Use mouse to aim

Left click to shoot

Space to jump

Tips:

Jump in mid-air to slow your descent!

The faster you clear a level, the more bonus score you get!

Be careful of what you don't choose; it ends up in the enemy's hands. An enemy can be spawned with powers you didn't pick!

Features:

Dynamic Game Feel: Choosing a power up will change the level's colour scheme and give each side a random animal with its respective colour. Level decorations will also spawn in the level according to the power ups the enemies have.

Dynamic Difficulty & Pacing: The game paces back and forth to bring you moments of high and low intensity. The game will increase its difficulty by an amount that's dependent on how well you did, reducing the risk of sudden difficulty spikes.

Cell Propagated Levels: Level generation made from a mix between cellular automata and modular generative techniques creates a versatile level that spawn as you go!
